title: How to import local files to the mobile phone？
answer:
1、Click ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111122161523.PNG).

      In the left pane of the File Manager interface, you can find all local files. In the right pane of the interface, you can find all the files on your communications device.  
2、In the right pane of the File Manager interface, select the path of the file to be imported.  
3、In the left pane of the File Manager interface, select a file and click to import the file to the specified path of your communications device. Or you can right-click the file to be imported, choose Copy, and then paste it to your communications device.  
4、You can also create, delete, search file and modify the name of the file in local by PC Suite.
